member.name: M:WinGRAB.ICapture.FullScreen
member.summary: Captures the image of the entire screen (all monitors). Returns a bitmap if the function succeeded, otherwise returns nothing/exception.

member.name: M:WinGRAB.ICapture.DisplayMonitor(System.Windows.Forms.Screen)
member.summary: Captures the image of the specified display device. Returns a bitmap if the function succeeded, otherwise returns nothing/exception.

member.name: M:WinGRAB.ICapture.ActiveWindow
member.summary: Captures the image of an active window from the screen. Returns a bitmap if the function succeeded, otherwise returns nothing/exception.

member.name: M:WinGRAB.ICapture.Window(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Captures the image of a window from the screen specified by a handle. Returns a bitmap if the function succeeded, otherwise returns nothing/exception.
member.param: The handle to the window whose image should be captured.

member.name: M:WinGRAB.ICapture.Control(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Captures an image of a control. Returns a bitmap if the function succeeded, otherwise returns nothing/exception.
member.param: A point within the control in the screen coordinates.

member.name: M:WinGRAB.ICapture.Control(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Captures an image of a control. Returns a bitmap if the function succeeded, otherwise returns nothing/exception.

member.name: M:WinGRAB.ICapture.ScreenRectangle(System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Captures a rectangle image from the screen. Returns a bitmap if the function succeeded, otherwise returns nothing/exception.
member.param: A rectangle within the screen coordinates whose image should be captured.

member.name: P:WinGRAB.ICapture.Win32.Rect.IsEmpty
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this ICapture.Rect is empty.

member.name: M:WinGRAB.ICapture.Win32.Rect.ToRectangle
member.summary: Converts the ICapture.Rect object to System.Drawing.Rectangle object.

member.name: M:WinGRAB.ICapture.Win32.Rect.Inflate(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Inflates this ICapture.Rect by the specified amount.
member.param: The amount to inflate this ICapture.Rect horizontally.
The amount to inflate this ICapture.Rect vertically.

member.name: M:WinGRAB.ICapture.Win32.Rect.Copy(WinGRAB.ICapture.Win32.Rect)
member.summary: Copies the values of the specified ICapture.Rect to this ICapture.Rect.
member.param: An ICapture.Rect to be copied from.

member.name: T:WinGRAB.ICapture.Win32
member.summary: Represents win32 Api shared methods, structures, and constants.
